content: गुच्छः {@--1@} A bundle, bunch (in general). {@--2@} A bunch of flowers, a cluster of blossoms, a clump (of trees &c.); अक्ष्णोर्निक्षिपदंजनं श्रवणयोस्तापिच्छगुच्छावलिं <ls>Gīt. 11</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 48</ls>; <ls>Śi. 6. 50</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 229.</ls> {@--3@} The plumage of a peacock. {@--4@} A necklace of pearls (in general). {@--5@} A pearl necklace of 32 (or, according to some, of 70) strings.
